text:
RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple : Discourse on ‘Sithargalin Anmeegam’ by M. Ilango, Railway Colony, 7 p.m.

Sri Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple : Discourse on ‘Periyapuranam’ by Prof. M. Gnanapoongothai, Old Thirukalyana Mandapam, 5 p.m.

Thiruvalluvar Mandram : Discourse on ‘Kantha Puranam’ by A. Arumugam, S.S. Colony, 5 p.m.

Sri Swami Tatwananda Ashram : Gita class by Swami Samanandar, Ayira Vysyar Primary School, South Avani Moola Street, 6.45 p.m.

Paneeru Thirumurai Mandram : Discourse on ‘Sivagnana Botham’ by N.S. Sundararaman, South Avadi Street, 7 p.m.

Young Men’s Brahmins’ Association : Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayanam and puja, No. 21 Sambandamoorthy Street, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre : Yoga and meditation classes, 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., and 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahma Kumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya : Free rajayoga meditation classes, 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar, 40 Sambandamoorthy Street, 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Yoga Research Centre : Yoga training by S. Yoganand, Department of Philosophy, The Madura College, 6.30 a.m.

GENERAL

The Hindu Young World : 16{+t}{+h}edition of The Hindu Young World Quiz for school students from Class 4 to Class 9, Thiagarajar College, Teppakulam, 10 a.m.

Madurai Kamaraj University : School of Religion, Philosophy and Humanist Thought, Lectures on ‘Christianity: The Perspective of Dr. J.C. Kumarappa’ and ‘Peace Philosophy of Dr. J.C. Kumarappa’ by Dr. M.P. Gurusamy, Director of J.C. Kumarappa Research Centre, Seminar Hall, 10:30 a.m. and 2:30 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous : Meeting, Holy Redeemers Church, Pondy Bazar, 7 a.m.; Quality Care Hospital, Ellis Nagar, 7 p.m.; A.G. Church, Gomathipuram, 7 p.m.
title: MADURAI TODAY
